item.description:
Doors open at 6 pm and show starts at 7 pm
$20 per person

Comedians are
Brad Mastrangelo
Paul Nardizzi
John David

There is a Cash bar, Raffles and alot of laughs.
You also can bring your own snacks for your table. This was a fun night last time we went and we headed over to the 99 after to continue the laughs.
All to Benefit Lions Eyes Research and Related Charities.

Organized by our friend Chuck... Deadline to respond is Monday February 23 so he can reserve seats. You can pay at the door.

group.name: Fun in So. NH and Merrimack Valley

item.name: Night of Comedy
